entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 2:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
